item.title: Install Apache jena fuseki
item.description: Download Apache Jena Fuseki from the official website. Official site Unzip the downloaded zip file to any location. The unzipped Apache Jena Fuseki will be placed. Double-click fuseki-server.bat to execute it. When executed, the command prompt will be launched. Visit Apache Jena Fuseki. localhost:3030 Please do the following: Select “manage datasets” select “add new dataset” Enter “garden” for the Dataset name Select “Persistent ( TDB2 )” of Dataset type Press create dataset A dataset is created.
